crawl.intro: In a valley close to home, in the not so distant future...
crawl.title: SIHLICONVALLEY
crawl.p1: Silicon Valley gave us infinite scroll and finite attention. It gave us "connecting the world" while building walls between people. It gave us disruption without asking what was worth keeping.
crawl.p2: We are not here to disrupt. We are here to build.
crawl.p3: Not venture-backed, but community-grown. Not scale-first, but human-first. Not moving fast and breaking things, but building slow and fixing them.
crawl.p4: This is the Sihlicon Valley. We build things meant to last. These are our projects.

sihlhack.title: SihlHack
sihlhack.description: Participant-driven energy hackathon platform where hackers unlock Zurich's industrial heritage data to innovate on decentralized energy, compute, and resilience.

luckhack.title: LuckHack
luckhack.description: CTF-style statistics hackathon with SSH terminal access. Teams solve probability and statistics challenges in a terminal environment.
